com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.framework.helpers

Class SCUISecureCookieHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.framework.helpers.SCUISecureCookieHelper

  • public class SCUISecureCookieHelper
extends java.lang.Object

    SCUISecureCookieHelper class is the class that checks for the cookie in the secure Https connection given in the SCUIContext through the ISCUISecureCookieProvider. The helper maintains ISCUISecureCookieProvider per application and when the session is invalidated the ISCUISecureCookieProvider is removed.

    ISCUISecureCookieProvider rasrinivasan

      • loadSecureCookieProvider

        public static ISCUISecureCookieProvider loadSecureCookieProvider(SCUIContext uiContext)
        This method loads SecureCookie provider using web.xml context parameter. It allows ISCUISecureCookieProvider to be set only once for an application. uiContext of the type SCUIContext ISCUISecureCookieProvider

      • loadSecureCookieProvider

        public static ISCUISecureCookieProvider loadSecureCookieProvider(javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext)
        This method loads SecureCookie provider using web.xml context parameter. This method should be used while initializing provider using a init servlet where SCUIContext is not available. It allows ISCUISecureCookieProvider to be set only once for an application. servletContext of the type javax.servlet.ServletContext ISCUISecureCookieProvider

      • setSecureCookie

        public static void setSecureCookie(SCUIContext uiContext)

      • setSecureCookieProvider

        public static void setSecureCookieProvider(SCUIContext uiContext,
                                           ISCUISecureCookieProvider secureCookieProvider)
        This method sets given SecureCookie provider for current application. It allows ISCUISecureCookieProvider to be set only once for an application. uiContext of the type SCUIContext secureCookieProvider of type ISCUISecureCookieProvider

      • setSecureCookieProvider

        public static void setSecureCookieProvider(javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext,
                                           ISCUISecureCookieProvider secureCookieProvider)
        This method sets given SecureCookie provider for current application. This method should be used while initializing provider from a init servlet where SCUIContext is not available. It allows ISCUISecureCookieProvider to be set only once for an application. servletContext of the type javax.servlet.ServletContext secureCookieProvider of the type ISCUISecureCookieProvider

      • validateCookie

        public static boolean validateCookie(SCUIContext uiContext)
        validateCookie method calls the SCUIsecureCookieProvider's validateCookie method uiContext of the type SCUIContext False if actual validation fails, True in all other cases
